attributes.additional_details:
The millions of Pakistanis across the globe demand that United Kingdom stop providing a safe haven to Altaf Hussain, the leader of Mutahidda Qaumi Movement in Pakistan.

Altaf Hussain has been involved in extensive terrorist acts and crimes in Pakistan and has over three thousand cases of corruption against him in Pakistan.

His latest act of threatening to slay and murder peaceful Pakistani protesters on May 12, 2013 in Karachi Teen Talwar Chowk area on national television is deplorable and is against fundamental human rights of freedom of speech. These acts are a direct violation of s.1(2) of the Terrorism Act 2006.

Additionally, he is known to carry out activities to induce people to participate in terrorist activity, contract to s.6 of the 2006 Act.

Pakistanis across the globe demand that Altaf Hussain be arrested for his terrorist activities.
